snippet: In a lawsuit filed Wednesday, Benson said he wanted to remove the Saints and the Pelicans from trusts he set up for his daughter and her children.
abstract: New Orleans Saints and Pelicans owner Tom Benson files lawsuit to remove the teams from trusts he set up for his daughter Renee Benson and her children in exchange for promissory notes worth $556 million.
lead_paragraph: In a lawsuit filed Wednesday, Benson said he wanted to remove the Saints and the Pelicans from trusts he set up for his daughter and her children.

headline.main: Saints Owner Tom Benson Files Suit to Remove Teams from Trust
headline.print_headline: Saints Owner Tom Benson Files Suit to Remove Teams from Trust
